H0.text: Red is the color of visible light that has the shortest wavelength among the listed colors.

H1.text: Green is the color of visible light that has the shortest wavelength.

H2.text: Violet is the color of visible light that has the shortest wavelength.

H3.text: Yellow is the color of visible light that has the shortest wavelength.

A4.text: Violet light has a wavelength between approximately 380 and 450 nanometers.
